code: import axios from'axios';const instance=axios.create({withCredentials:true,baseURL:'https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/',headers:{'API-KEY':'42065ba3-5e5d-40d4-943f-51614d3c588d'}});export const usersAPI={getUsers(){let currentPage=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let pageSize=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;return instance.get("users?page=".concat(currentPage,"&count=").concat(pageSize)).then(response=>response.data);},unfollowUser(userId){return instance.delete("follow/".concat(userId)).then(response=>response.data);},followUser(userId){return instance.post("follow/".concat(userId)).then(response=>response.data);}};export const authAPI={auth(){return instance.get("auth/me");},singIn(email,password){let rememberMe=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return instance.post("auth/login",{email,password,rememberMe});},singOut(){return instance.delete("auth/login");}};export const profileAPI={getProfile(userId){return instance.get("profile/"+userId);},getStatus(userId){return instance.get("profile/status/"+userId);},updateStatus(status){return instance.put("profile/status/",{status:status});}};
